reviews.review: Espectacular <3

Nejlepší logická hříčka všech dob!

Taky jste tak milovali logickou hříčku LASERMANIA na osmibity? Tahle je ve 3D, v první osobě, a ještě mnohem lepší !! :-)

Nejvíc na hře miluju: Samozřejmě portály, úžasnou atmosféru, hudbu a zvuky!,  příběh, hlas GLaDOS i robotů, LASERy + "zrcátka" (ty kostky s čočkama), světelné mosty a geniální dizajn místností - HÁDANEK ! :-)

Tahle hra prostě nemá chybu! Chytne Vás a nepustí, dokud ji nedohrajete! :-)
Dokonalá hra. K tomu prostě už nemám co dodat.
Simplemente genial!!

It`s been greatly improved than the first one. With much more creative puzzles, an interesting story with funny characters and great map designs this game is a very great game. If you played Portal and liked it, you must play this game. If you`re a newcomer it dosen`t matter, play it!

Portal 2 - mittlerweile etwas angegraut, meiner Meinung nach immer noch eines der Besten "Knobelspiele" auf dem Markt. 

Ziel des Spieles ist es, in jump-'n-run Manier den Ausgang eines mit Plattformen, Schaltern und Waffentürmen gespickten Levels zu erreichen. Das ganze ist mit Denkaufgaben garniert: Mittels eine "Portalkanone" kann man ein Eingangsportal und ein Ausgangsportal an viele Decken, Wände und Böden "schießen". Was einfach klingt macht es oft erforderlich "Um die Ecke" zu denken. Dabei ist die Physik realistisch umgesetzt, Beipspielsweise der Grundsatz der Impulserhaltung: Mit hoher Geschwindigkeit durch ein Portal im Boden zu fallen kann sehr nützlich sein wenn man sich durch das Gegenportal an der Wand über einen Abgrund katapultieren möchte.

Die Level führen zunächst an die nötigen Mechanismen heran. Hat man sie einmal verstanden ist der Gesamtschwierigkeitsgrad moderat. Ein paar knackige Probleme gibt es jedoch auch.

Never forget: The cake is a lie!

テストチェンバーを自分で作れるっていうのも良かった。ただ実績が協力プレイではないと解除できないのがあるからフレンドがいない自分だと詰む。

超一流的第一人称解谜游戏，可以使用传送枪在地板、墙壁等表面上打开传送门，在两扇门之间互相穿梭，并完成各种挑战。
你甚至能在自己的前后方向各打开一个传送门，并能在传送门中看到“无数”个自己。
游戏最大的乐趣就在于运用各种游戏道具和巧妙的操作攻破一个又一个关卡而带来的成就感，使得你根本停不下来。当你打通单人剧情时，这款游戏甚至才刚刚开始：难度更大且需要默契的双人合作模式，你需要和你的伙伴相互配合来体验《传送门2》100%的乐趣。
该游戏也包含了设计关卡的功能，可以在创意工坊中浏览或分享自定义关卡，当你打完官方地图后继续尝试新的挑战。
（注：此款游戏节奏较慢，需要在闯关时大量思考，可能不太适合喜爱快节奏游戏的玩家。）

总结：这是一款不可多得的好游戏！强烈推荐！

传送门已经出了很久了，该评测的都应该已经评测完了 但我还是很想说一下我的感受
1：传送枪的设定很好玩 这已经很吸引我了
2：剧情？没有通关不敢评价，而在过程中真正感受到的乐趣都在每一关的解谜上了2333
3：双人模式应该很好玩。然而目前找不到人和我玩...：（
4：尽管没有玩过传送门的前任作品（只玩过试玩版），但在传送门2中也有一些和前作相关联的场景，仅仅是试玩版的场景都能让我有印象，这很棒

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Portal 2 je jedna z nejlepších puzzle her na steamu asi hned po Portal 1.
Staví na základech z prvního dílu a doplňuje příběh. Pár "chyb" a plotholů se najde ale jinak super hra.
Akorát mě mrzí že nefungují kosmetické předměty a jejich získávání tak jak by mělo.

Honestly I'm still baffled and I'm clueless how to start this review. I'm still clueless how they set the bar for their prequel this high and even provided with a better sequel. I can't wait to jump into the co-op function honestly since the singleplayer was this good.

Valve literally took a look at Portal and said what could we improve towards the sequel. They added new general features like a loading screen, which I didn't find mandatory, and you can see where your portals are placed through walls. They stuck with similar ideas to complete their puzzles and added loads of new ways to solve puzzles and move along the map. Speaking of puzzles, they added so many, that it seems that the game is twice as long as the prequel. They added lasers and with them you have cubes which you can use to direct the lasers in any way you want.  You have bouncing pads and on walls you see indicators which show where you land. You have bridges to guide you around the map. You also have floating pads which can work in two directions but only when triggered by a button. Finally you have three kinds of gel red blue and white. Red gel gives you a speed boost. Blue gel gives you a jumping boost and white gel allows you to portal on it, mainly for places that you couldn't portal on before.

Obviously the things previously said aren't the ones that baffled me but it is mainly the environment. The story is amazingly well built and it teaches us more about apeture sciences. It also contains a few plot twists here and there. The places you visit are fairly new but you'll visit some well remembered places from portal. Something they also introduced is companions, the most part of the game you'll have a object travelling with you. One of them is a funny little core with a british accent. Aside from entertaining you the bots can help you sometimes to get to certain paths. The jokes are as good as last game so expect a good laugh.

I highly recommend  that you buy this game, and play it for the rest of the day or week. Turn off your notification, because the game doesn't support tabbing, and enjoy this gem for many and many times you want and are supposed to complete the story. (Edit:) You also can choose from many maps from the community to test out so you won't get tired of the story and you can still play.

Одна из лучших игр для прохождения в кооперативе! Прошла вдоль и поперёк несколько раз.
Головоломки очень развивают логику и пространсвтенное мышление.

ÚNICO, este juego es de los mejores en la historia de los juegos, que marcó un antes y un despues. La historia perfecta, la forma de mostrartela, la jugabilidad, los mapas de la comunidad el cooperativo hacen de este juego uno de los mejores que he jugado.
